segments.text: Excuse me . What's the actual flying time from here to San Francisco ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me what time we're arriving ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Let me see ... at 6:15 a . m . local time tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And that'll be 10:15 p . m . Taipei time .
segments.speaker: S2
